heading: Commercial Trading
description: DWH Warenhandel is a trading company with multiple experiences in many types of commercial goods, the most important of them are used and new Solar panels, all kinds of household electrical appliances, Medical tools, Cosmetics, Cars and heavy vehicles, Auto parts and many other items. And also we can provide goods requested by merchants (buyers), and our focus and principal market are merchants residing in the countries of the Middle East in general and Arab countries, however, we also supply to other regions worldwide.
descOne: Fill out the request form on our website with all the necessary information about your needs and make sure all information is valid such as email, phone number, etc.
featureTwo: We find your product for you:
descTwo: We start our scouting and contact our partners to find you the best product that matches your request.
descThree: The merchant and the company reach an agreement/bargain.
featureFour: We ship the product to you:
descFour: The merchant pays an upfront that's up to 50 per cent, to secure their goods, and then the company ships their goods and services. When the merchant receives their goods and services in their respective location, they pay the remaining part of the money
clientSub: We have been working with clients around the world
tcontent1: They deliver goods efficiently and very fast. Goods did not take time before they got to me.
tcontent2: They Happen to know the latest products in the market and they ship them to me.
tcontent3: Their Customer Care and their trucks are what I love most about them. Very durable.
aboutText:
DWH Warenhandel is a trading company with multiple experiences in many types of commercial goods, the most important of them are used and new Solar panels, all kinds of household electrical appliances, Medical tools, Cosmetics, Cars and heavy vehicles, Auto parts and many other items. And also we can provide goods requested by merchants (buyers), and our focus and principal market are merchants residing in the countries of the Middle East in general and Arab countries, however, we also supply to other regions worldwide.
We find the best offers for the previously mentioned goods and commodities through our strong experience, relationship, and our constant communication directly with the suppliers and manufacturers of these items. Our company also has contact with shipping companies. For example, if an agreement is reached between us and the merchant, we discuss whether we receive the shipping process in coordination with international shipping companies, and appropriate and satisfactory prices can also be provided.
visionText: Establishing and nurturing lifetime relationships with our customers.
missionText: To earn our Customer's loyalty by delivering sales and service experiences with high quality, excellent value, integrity and enthusiasm and striving to go the extra step that transforms Customer Satisfaction into Customer Delight.
name: Name/ Name of Company
shoeSection: Shoes (Trainers shoes, Sneakers and safety boots)
desc: Briefly describe your request or requirement
